review_title: Be a part of the biggest international project
pros: Incredible experience preparing such a huge project, different titles of activities, direct contact to organizing committees of different countries. Multilingual working environment
cons: Troubles and misunderstanding inside the organization, that appear as a result of different understanding of how things should work and different understanding of responsibilities
Extremely Japanese (insular) environment; i.e. not international

pros: A stress-free environment and pays extra hours
cons: Public structure, inflexibility, poor design in the office
